main event: On September 15, 1953, civilians in Black Hawk, South Dakota reported sighting an unidentified aerial phenomenon, describing a bright red object that changed to a whitish yellow glow and then to a brilliant white. The object moved back and forth and seemed to hover over a movie screen before disappearing behind a hill.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing a red glow travelling back and forth from north to south at approximately 150-200 mph.
The object changed colors from red to whitish yellow and then to a brilliant white.
It appeared to stand still at times and flickered like a star.
The object seemed to hover over a movie screen before suddenly disappearing behind a hill.
The sky was clear of clouds, and there were many stars with a very dull glowing moon in the west.
sighted object: bright red object that changed colors to whitish yellow and then to a brilliant white
